org.intermine.bio.dataconversion

Class FastaLoaderTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      • org.apache.tools.ant.Task
        • org.intermine.task.DirectDataLoaderTask
          • org.intermine.task.FileDirectDataLoaderTask
            • org.intermine.bio.dataconversion.FastaLoaderTask
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FlyBaseFeatureFastaLoaderTask, NCBIFastaLoaderTask, UniProtFastaLoaderTask

    public class FastaLoaderTask
extends FileDirectDataLoaderTask
    A task that can read a set of FASTA files and create the corresponding Sequence objects in an ObjectStore.

    • Method Detail

      • setFastaTaxonId

        public void setFastaTaxonId(java.lang.String fastaTaxonId)
        Set the Taxon Id of the Organism we are loading. Can be space delimited list of taxonIds
        Parameters:
        fastaTaxonId - the taxon id to set.

      • setSequenceType

        public void setSequenceType(java.lang.String sequenceType)
        Set the sequence type to be passed to the FASTA parser. The default is "dna".
        Parameters:
        sequenceType - the sequence type

      • setIdSuffix

        public void setIdSuffix(java.lang.String idSuffix)
        Set the suffix to add to identifiers from the FASTA file when creating BioEnitys.
        Parameters:
        idSuffix - the suffix

      • setClassName

        public void setClassName(java.lang.String className)
        The class name to use for objects created during load. Generally this is "org.intermine.model.bio.LocatedSequenceFeature" or "org.intermine.model.bio.Protein"
        Parameters:
        className - the class name

      • getClassName

        public java.lang.String getClassName()
        Return the class name set with setClassName().
        Returns:
        the class name

      • setClassAttribute

        public void setClassAttribute(java.lang.String classAttribute)
        The attribute of the class created to set with the identifying field. If not set will be 'primaryIdentifier'.
        Parameters:
        classAttribute - the class name

      • setDataSourceName

        public void setDataSourceName(java.lang.String dataSourceName)
        Datasource for any bioentities created
        Parameters:
        dataSourceName - name of datasource for items created

      • setDataSetTitle

        public void setDataSetTitle(java.lang.String dataSetTitle)
        If a value is specified this title will used when a DataSet is created.
        Parameters:
        dataSetTitle - the title of the DataSets of any new features

      • setFileArray

        protected void setFileArray(java.io.File[] files)
        Directly set the array of files to read from. Use this for testing with junit.
        Parameters:
        files - the File objects

      • processFile

        public void processFile(java.io.File file)
        Handles each fasta file. Factored out so we can supply files for testing.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • getOrganism

        protected org.intermine.model.bio.Organism getOrganism(org.biojava.bio.seq.Sequence bioJavaSequence)
                                                throws ObjectStoreException
        Get and store() the Organism object to reference when creating new objects.
        Parameters:
        bioJavaSequence - the biojava sequence to be parsed
        Returns:
        the new Organism
        Throws:
        ObjectStoreException - if there is a problem

      • getDataSet

        public org.intermine.model.bio.DataSet getDataSet()
                                           throws ObjectStoreException
        Return the DataSet to add to each object.
        Returns:
        the DataSet
        Throws:

      • extraProcessing

        protected void extraProcessing(org.biojava.bio.seq.Sequence bioJavaSequence,
                   org.intermine.model.bio.Sequence flymineSequence,
                   org.intermine.model.bio.BioEntity bioEntity,
                   org.intermine.model.bio.Organism organism,
                   org.intermine.model.bio.DataSet dataSet)
                        throws ObjectStoreException
        Do any extra processing needed for this record (extra attributes, objects, references etc.) This method is called before the new objects are stored
        Parameters:
        bioJavaSequence - the BioJava Sequence
        flymineSequence - the FlyMine Sequence
        bioEntity - the object that references the flymineSequence
        organism - the Organism object for the new InterMineObject
        dataSet - the DataSet object
        Throws:
        ObjectStoreException - if a store() fails during processing

      • getIdentifier

        protected java.lang.String getIdentifier(org.biojava.bio.seq.Sequence bioJavaSequence)
        For the given BioJava Sequence object, return an identifier to be used when creating the corresponding BioEntity. if | is present the middle bit is returned, eg sp|Q9V8R9-2|41_DROME
        Parameters:
        bioJavaSequence - the Sequenece
        Returns:
        an identifier

      • getTaxonId

        protected java.lang.Integer getTaxonId(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - eg. Drosophila melanogaster
        Returns:
        the taxonId
